name: Antiquia Lost
description: An authentic RPG of a journey with a girl made of slime! Enjoy fluid 2D turn-based battles! Bine is a young man who lives in a small rural village. One day, he is asked by Lunaria, a girl who lives near the village, to go with her to the royal capital...
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 and up Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB VRAM Storage: 544 MB available space
